revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Review proofreading corrections; add date note.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p: I have just received this letter from mrMr. heyddheyde i feel real sad to think poor han has lost her thumb but if the bone was affected it was the only thing that could be done i wrote a letter to her last week a good letter and i gave mrMr. heydeHeyde hint of his insult to you and not giving han the letter i wrote nothing ugly to him for fear it would be worse for han) i think very likely she will get better now if she dont don't fret about it it is good its it's on her left hand as she can sew without it

i got your letter Walter dear on tuesday Tuesday with 2 dollars all safe Jeff has gone to boston Boston but will be back to night They talk of going to st louLou is St. Louis next week i dont don't know how it will be mattyMatty is quite smart but cant doo do much she sews but cant can't doo do much else the children is well and awfull awful troublesome i cant can't writ it but i have got so far through the weather is very cold indeed you must come if you can walterWalter dear as you spoke off of Jeffy and all are going to board when they go back they cant can't come to washington Washigton this time
